metadata.comments: This template was developed for deployment of mw and agents

metadata.description: The name for the mw virtual machine
The disk type for mw virtual machine
Choose the prefix of agent VM name
Choose how many agents will be deployed
The disk type for the agent virtual machine

resources.comments: User Identity used for deployment scripts.
resources.name: [variables('identityName')]

resources.comments: Contributor role is assigned to user identity.
resources.name: [variables('roleAssignmentId')]

resources.comments: Lists blobs in a given container. Filters the results to return only blobs whose name begin with vhdMwPrefix or vhdLicensingPrefix.
resources.name: [variables('scriptNameGetVhds')]

properties.scriptContent: [concat('mwresult=$(az storage blob list --account-name "', variables('storageAccountName'), '" --container-name "', variables('containerName'), '" --prefix ', variables('vhdMwPrefix'), ' --account-key "Azure account key to be completed" --connection-string="DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=loadcorevhds;AccountKey=Account Key to be completed;EndpointSuffix=core.windows.net" | jq ''sort_by(.properties.lastModified) | reverse''); licresult=$(az storage blob list --account-name ', variables('storageAccountName'), ' --container-name ', variables('containerName'), ' --prefix ', variables('vhdLicensingPrefix'), ' --account-key Account key to be completed --connection-string="DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=loadcorevhds;AccountKey=Account key to be completed;EndpointSuffix=core.windows.net" | jq ''sort_by(.properties.lastModified) | reverse''); myres=$(echo -n {"mwresult": && ([ -z "$mwresult" ] && echo "None" || echo $mwresult | jq -jc ''map({name: .name})'') && echo -n ,"licresult": && ([ -z "$licresult" ] && echo "None" || echo $licresult | jq -jc ''map({name: .name})'') && echo \}); echo $myres > $AZ_SCRIPTS_OUTPUT_PATH')]

resources.comments: Default Network Security Group for mw and agents
resources.name: [variables('mw-networkSecurityGroupName')]

resources.comments: Default Virtual Network for mw and agents
resources.name: [variables('mw-vnetName')]

resources.comments: Public IP address for mw virtual machine
resources.name: [variables('publicIPAddressName')]

resources.comments: Mw Network Interface in subnet1
resources.name: [variables('mw-nicName')]

resources.comments: The base operating system for the mw vm
resources.name: [variables('imageMwName')]

resources.comments: MW virtual machine
resources.name: [parameters('Mw Name')]

resources.comments: Creates used directories. Waits until the script install.sh is configured. Runs the script.
resources.name: [concat(parameters('Mw Name'),'/LinuxCustomScriptExtension')]

resources.comments: Public IP address for licensing virtual machine
resources.name: [concat(variables('licensingName'), variables('sessionId'), '-ip')]

resources.comments: Licensing Network Interface in same subnet as mw virtual machine
resources.name: [concat(variables('licensingName'), variables('sessionId'), '-nic')]

resources.comments: The base operating system for the licensing vm
resources.name: [variables('imageLicensingName')]

resources.comments: Licensing virtual machine
resources.name: [concat(variables('licensingName'), variables('sessionId'), '-vm')]

resources.comments: Creates agents
resources.name: [concat(parameters('Mw Name'), '-agentsDeploy')]

metadata.comments: This template was developed for deployment of agents

metadata.description: Choose how many agents will be deployed
Choose the prefix of agent VM name
The disk type for the agent virtual machine
The name of MW virtual machine

resources.comments: Lists blobs in a given container. Filters the results to return only blobs whose name begin with vhdAgentPrefix.
resources.name: [variables('scriptNameGetVhd')]

properties.scriptContent: [concat('result=$(az storage blob list --account-name ', variables('storageAccountName'), ' --container-name ', variables('containerName'), ' --prefix ', variables('vhdAgentPrefix'), '  --account-key "DfScJLq41uGTZg2j82KIVpHDwiPuVldcVe23e4YoMuapAj+nMKrSls9hjfVy9bL8cYeb/epQld32StVjYjEP+Q==" --connection-string="DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=loadcorevhds;AccountKey=Account key to be completed;EndpointSuffix=core.windows.net" | jq ''sort_by(.properties.lastModified) | reverse''); echo $result | jq -c ''{result: map({name: .name})}'' > $AZ_SCRIPTS_OUTPUT_PATH')]

resources.comments: Public IP addresses for virtual machines(one for each virtual machine)
resources.name: [concat(parameters('Agent Name Prefix'), copyIndex(1), variables('sessionId'), '-ip')]

resources.comments: Network Interfaces in the same subnet as mw virtual machine(one for each agent virtual machine)
resources.name: [concat(parameters('Agent Name Prefix'), copyIndex(1), variables('sessionId'), '-nic1')]

resources.comments: Network Interfaces in another subnet compared to the mw virtual machine(one for each agent virtual machine)
resources.name: [concat(parameters('Agent Name Prefix'), copyIndex(1), variables('sessionId'), '-nic2')]

resources.comments: The base operating system for the agent vm
resources.name: [variables('imageAgentName')]

resources.comments: Agent virtual machines
resources.name: [concat(parameters('Agent Name Prefix'), copyIndex(1), variables('sessionId'))]

resources.comments: Sets up the network interface. Runs the script.
resources.name: [concat(parameters('Agent Name Prefix'), copyIndex(1), variables('sessionId'), '/LinuxCustomScriptExtension')]

settings.commandToExecute: [concat('ip link set dev eth1 up && /home/ixia/agent-setup.sh ', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Network/networkInterfaces', concat(parameters('Mw Name'), '-nic')), '2019-12-01', 'Full').properties.ipConfigurations[0].properties.privateIPAddress, ' eth0', ' eth1',' y')]
